text: ya min amantum biallah wsddaqtm rasulih waeamiltum bihadayih 'ukhrijuu alzakat almafrudata, wtsddaqu mimaa 'aetakum allah qabl muji' yawm alqiamat hin laa baye fayakun rabhun, wala mal taftadun bih 'anfusakum min eadhab allahi, wala sadaqat sidiyq tunqdhkm, wala shafie yamlik takhfif aleadhab eankum. walkafirun hum alzaalimun almutajawizun hudud allh
